reviewText: Just a great dvd. Bugs Bunny episode the best.
how can anyone not love the nerd?
Perfect condition and amazing show! Was so excited that this was offered on DVD!

He's the angry video game nerd!  And he won't stand for horrible games anymore!

Another hilarious onslaught of profanity and poopy humor covers this crap encrusted set.  Again, fun box art that follows suit with the binding having the logo when all sets assembled.  Volume two all condensed onto one disc, so if you missed out on volume 2, be sure to pick up this golden turd instead.
I watched these on YouTube, but I wanted to be able to watch them without relying on Internet, so I got the DVDs. Just a lot of fun to watch.
